sentences.english: The Dasha River is the mother river of Dandong.
sentences.chinese: 大沙河是丹東的母親河。

sentences.english: Devil down words are not allowed to put a man a horse too shahe bridge.
sentences.chinese: 鬼子放下話說不準放一人一馬過大沙河橋。
